participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Lila is creative and introspective, often lost in her thoughts and ideas. She enjoys expressing herself through her appearance and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is practical and down-to-earth, with a love for simple pleasures and a friendly demeanor. He enjoys chatting with people and sharing stories.
participant_2.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.
